rules_text:
Onslaught, delve [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each life your opponents have lost this turn. Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Haste, slipstream [i](This can't be blocked as long as only creatures with slipstream are attacking.)[/i]
You may cast instant and/or sorcery cards exiled with Megalodon.
